name: Sonic X Freedom Planet: Dawn Of Mobius
name_original: Sonic X Freedom Planet: Dawn Of Mobius
description:
Sonic X Freedom Planet is a game made in RPG Maker MV, if it wasn't obvious.

The Story

The Dark Lord has awoken from his universe, and now he wants to execute every single being in the universe! The Freedom Planet characters heard about it, so they evacuated to another universe: MOBIUS. Sonic meets them in the way, and so they head out for adventure!
